metadata.title: CVE-2016-4970 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
handler/ssl/OpenSslEngine.java in Netty 4.0.x before 4.0.37.Final and 4.1.xbefore 4.1.1.Final allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(infinite loop).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnetty-java - 1:4.0.37-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netty package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.0.37-1').
